DataElement.preferredName: Infection Prior One Year Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether an individual identifies a history of having an infection within the year prior to questioning.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to infection, a disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, or parasitic agent_The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact. -- 2003

Concepts.definition: A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, fungal, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
